title: Disaster follows an astronaut back to Earth in the thriller 'Constellation'
description: Watching this Apple TV+ series takes commitment and attention, but you'll be rewarded for that effort with a haunting story that, at its center, is about the love between a mother and a daughter.

title: A gender-swapping photo app helped Lucy Sante come out as trans at age 67
description: In 2021, Sante, who was assigned male at birth, was playing around with a face-altering app and she had a breakthrough. Her new memoir is I Heard Her Call My Name.

title: Why a disqualified Russian candidate remains a critic of Putin
description: When asked whether his political activities put him in danger, Boris Nadezhdin quoted a proverb, "If you are afraid of wolves, you should not go to the forest."

title: NPR Topics: Home Page Top Stories
description: Top stories in the U.S. and world news, politics, health, science, business, music, arts and culture. Nonprofit journalism with a mission. This is NPR.

title: Ex-FBI source charged with Biden lies is tied to Russian intelligence, prosecutors say
description: Federal prosecutors say that Alexander Smirnov admitted to authorities that "officials associated with Russian intelligence were involved in passing a story" about President Biden's son, Hunter.
